title: A guide to optimizing your cross-border sales on Shopify
excerpt: Enable local processing through your existing Shopify stores with our Merchant of Record model with zero technical lift.

heroImage.alt: A guide to optimizing your cross-border sales on Shopify

blocks.quote: “Markets is an attractive and cost-effective option for Shopify merchants, as it allows them to expand and test a new region with lower costs to market. This gives you time to prove your business case before investing further time, money and staff resources in that region. When used in conjunction with Expansion Stores, Markets can also help to broaden your reach and serve additional markets beyond those where you are already established.“ Nichola Birch, Lead Product Manager at Swanky

blocks.text: This independence is critical for brands seeking a more robust approach to localizing their presence in individual markets. As each expansion store functions independently, you can implement optimizations in areas like region-specific content, promotional campaigns and discounts to enhance your ability to convert more in a chosen jurisdiction.

Expansion stores also enable functionality that's not just consumer-facing. They allow for the payout of multiple currencies, so if you need to be paid in currency local to your store in a specific region, extension stores can make that happen. The multi-store approach also enables a more straightforward solution for complex pricing, shipping, tax, and warehousing rules. As you can manage each store individually, you can tailor your stores for each of these areas to meet the requirements of a specific geography.
Taking Shopify Expansion Stores To The Next Level

blocks.quote: “Our unified codebase allows you to retain the localized content and functionality of each regional store, while managing shared components from the central codebase. Once the master code has been created, future expansion stores can be easily spun out for new regions, whilst any new updates or improvements can be automatically rolled out across all the stores simultaneously. “ Ian Jamieson, Head of Technology at Swanky

blocks.text: Furthermore, you can unlock local processing in over 70 markets worldwide with a no-code integration using our Merchant of Record model. By localizing your payments through the Reach MoR network, you can increase your conversions by up to 20% and gain fee savings of up to 40% in your Shopify expansion stores.
